typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['tripdata/yellow/*']) ~> yellowstaging
source(output(
		VendorID as string,
		lpep_pickup_datetime as string,
		lpep_dropoff_datetime as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		RatecodeID as string,
		PULocationID as string,
		DOLocationID as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		extra as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		ehail_fee as string,
		improvement_surcharge as string,
		total_amount as string,
		payment_type as string,
		trip_type as string,
		congestion_surcharge as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['tripdata/green/*']) ~> greenstaging
yellowstaging derive(taxitype = 'yellow') ~> DerivedColumn1
greenstaging derive(taxitype = 'green') ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sink1
